anthar palath siyaluma bas ratha eekabaddha sewawan kriyathmaka kirima da athhituwa atha.uthsawa samaya awasanaye kolambaata paminena janathawage gaman pahasuwa sandaha galla, mathara, ambailipitiya, monaragala, badulla, mahanuwara, hatan, kurunagala pradeshawalin wadi magi sankhyawak paminiya haki bawin ema dinawalata bas ratha siyaye sita desiyata wadi pramanayak dhawanayata ek kirimata piyawara gena atha.uthsawa kalaya thula madhyama bas ratha karyalaya paribhahirawa katunayaka, biyagama welenda kalapa, panadura badulla wishesha sewa ha sithawaka awissawella welanda kalapaya ha ee awata anubaddha karmantha purayata awashya prawahana pahasukam salasimata adala pradeshiya kalamanakaruwanta upades di athayi da disanayaka mahatha 'dinamina'ta pawasiya..

wichithra sinhala blogkaranaya sinhala blogkaruwange sansadaya shri lankeya blogkaranaya prachardhanaya ha sinhala blogkaruwange unnathiya udesa, sinhala blog liyannange ekamuthuwen nirmanaya wu nawathama web adawiya “sinhala blogkaruwange sansadaya “yi mema web adawiya haraha sinhala bhashawen blog liyannan wenuwen wiwidha isaw idiripath kirimata balaporoththu wana athara, eewayehi pradhana aramuna wanne tharangakarithwayak athikirima nowa sinhala blogkaruwan athara suhadathwayak godanagima ha nirmanashili bawa wardhanaya kirimayi.

mita samagamiwa jathyanthara mulya aramudala samaga rajapaksha aanduwe pawathi thawakalika aarowa kese ho sansiduwaganimata aanduwa uthsaha karamin inna bawa pahadiliyi.mulya aramudale nirnayaka wana awama ayawaya higaya wani aramunu penna gatha nohaki nisa aya waya idiripath kirima yalith wathawak aanduwa wisin kal dama thibenawa.athuru sammatha ginumakin thawakalikawa aga bera ganna gaman mulya aramudalata penwima sadaha badu aadayam wadi karaganne ha rajaye wiyadam adu karaganne kohomada kiyana barapathala gataluwata me dinawala aanduwa uththara soyamin sitinawa.rajaye subasadhana wiyadam kapa damima,paudgalikakaranaya,badu matha badu panawima wani piyawarayanta idiriyedi yannata siduwima me anuwa idiri masa kihipaya thula aniwaryayen dakagatha hakiwanu athayi apeksha karanna puluwan.
